verses.name: 2 Samuel 11:21
verses.text: Who smote Abimelech the son of Jerubbesheth? did not a woman cast a piece of a millstone upon him from the wall, that he died in Thebez? why went ye nigh the wall? then say thou, Thy servant Uriah the Hittite is dead also.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 11:22
verses.text: So the messenger went, and came and shewed David all that Joab had sent him for.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 11:23
verses.text: And the messenger said unto David, Surely the men prevailed against us, and came out unto us into the field, and we were upon them even unto the entering of the gate.
